title: Causal Decision Model
description: (DRAFT) -- Represents a Causal Decision Model for OpenDI-compliant software.

$schema.title: JSON Schema URI
$schema.description: URI for schema, used for validation. Likely a URL to the public source file for this schema.

meta.title: Asset Metadata
meta.description: Metadata shared by all DI Assets

runnableModels.title: Runnable Decision Models List
runnableModels.description: List containing the runnable model (or set of model components) used for computing or simulating this CDM.

diagrams.title: Model Diagrams List
diagrams.description: List of diagrams (likely Causal Decision Diagrams) associated with this model.

evaluatableAssets.title: Evaluatable Assets List
evaluatableAssets.description: List of all Evaluatable Assets attached to this model. May be used by one or more Runnable Models.

inputOutputValues.title: Input/Output Values List
inputOutputValues.description: List of all Input/Output values used by Runnable Models in this CDM. I/O Values can be read or set by Runnable Models, and interactively in Diagrams, via Controls. A single I/O Value can be referenced in multiple Runnable Models and Controls.

controls.title: Controls List
controls.description: List of all DI Controls for this model. Controls connect I/O values to Diagram Elements, allowing values to be set or displayed.

addons.title: Addon Data
addons.description: Holds addon objects for storing data not specified in OpenDI standards.
